name: Waystar Room
description: Boasts panoramic views of the city. Great for intimidating your staff and showing them who's boss.

name: Private Jet
description: Perfect for that meeting that just can't wait until your transatlantic destination. Book this space for just $11,000 per billable hour, taken directly out of your department's budget.

name: Willa Room
description: This space is great for team improv sessions (or any aspiring playwrights in your midst). Studies show that improv helps improve public speaking skills.

name: Siobhan Room
description: Have a major company wide announcement to make? This room provides two large projector screens and a podium for all your public speaking needs.

name: Logan Room
description: Bright and airy. This room is designed for smaller team meetings.

name: Dining Room
description: Plan your next dark, yet tasteful team dinner.
